sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
v-container(fill-height='')

  // Tweet Card Start
  v-row(align='center' justify='center')
    v-col(cols='12' md='8')
      TweetCard(v-bind:tweet='tweet' v-bind:tweet-text='tweet-text' @display-filters='displayFilters')

  TweetFilters(v-bind:showfilters='showFilters' @toggle-filter="$emit('toggle-filter', $event)" v-bind:filters='filters')

</template>

<script>
import { Twitter } from "../../../services/Twitter";
import TweetCard from "./TweetCard";
import TweetFilters from "./TweetFilters";

var twitter = new Twitter();

export default {
  name: "Tweet",
  props: ["tweet-text", "tweet", "filters"],
  components: {
    TweetCard,
    TweetFilters
  },
  methods: {
    //Show/hide filter sheet
    displayFilters() {
      this.showFilters = !this.showFilters;
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      showFilters: false,
    };
  },
}
</script>

<style>
/* -- Highlighting CSS Rules -- */
.highlightURL {
  text-decoration: underline;
  text-decoration-style: dotted;
  text-decoration-color: var(--v-accent-lighten1);
  color: #ffffff;
}
.highlightURL:hover {
  background-color: var(--v-accent-lighten2);
}
.highlightHashtag {
  text-decoration: underline;
  text-decoration-style: dotted;
  text-decoration-color: var(--v-warning-lighten1);
  color: #ffffff;
}
.highlightHashtag:hover {
  background-color: var(--v-warning-lighten2);
  cursor: pointer;
}

#tweet-card {
  background-color: var(--v-secondary-base);
}

.btn-light {
  color: white!important
}
</style>
